remarks: The meet of two different lattice planes in a lattice volume is a lattice line.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jul-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2lplnm2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2lplnm2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2lplnm2.a $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2lplnm2.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2lplnm2.v $e |- V = ( LVols ` K ) $.
2lplnm2N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. P /\ Y e. P /\ W e. V ) /\ ( X .<_ W /\ Y .<_ W /\ X =/= Y ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. N ) $.
